author: jdcasey
msg: o We should have a viable offline mode now. Plugin sensitivity updates to follow.
o See it0069 and it1014 for offline mode tests.
o Brett, building maven-plugins in offline mode with org/apache/maven/plugin/* removed will now give a nice error message. :)

author: bnicholes
msg: mod_ldap: Fix PR 36563. Keep track of the number of attributes retrieved from LDAP so that all of the values can be properly cached even if the value is NULL.

author: ajith
msg: A small error in the emitter which entered the wrong value in the service.xml

author: jorton
msg: for the directory, ignore the inherited override_opts field.
